channel.title: Baby Dies While Man Plays Playstation
channel.description:
sauce: http://kotaku.com/5743558/baby-dies-while-man-plays-playstation
This person needs to be banned from life. I mean, he literally needs to be hung from his balls and then shot through the arm every 10 minutes.

item.title: Baby Dies While Man Plays Playstation
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:20, topic:380050”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=475892.msg3481809#msg3481809 date=1296225574]
Seriously, its not that hard to supervise an infant.
[/quote]I think you would find that your mother disagrees.[/quote]

I have a 5 year old brother, I used to watch him quite a bit when he was an infant. If I can handle it, I’ m pretty sure an adult can as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Baby Dies While Man Plays Playstation

item.title: Baby Dies While Man Plays Playstation
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:20, topic:380050”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=475892.msg3481809#msg3481809 date=1296225574]
Seriously, its not that hard to supervise an infant.
[/quote]I think you would find that your mother disagrees.[/quote]
Probably. Maybe he should have said it’s not that hard to supervise an infant to the extent that you don’t kill them.

This is ridiculous.

item.title: Baby Dies While Man Plays Playstation
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:380050”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=475892.msg3480187#msg3480187 date=1296050283]

Surprising though? Absolutely not.

Yeah, with GT5 coming out not too long ago and Mass Effect 2 finally being released on the PS3 - not surprising!
[/quote]
No, I mean it’s not surprising that there’s somebody out there who’s fucked up enough not to supervise a child properly.[/quote]Eh? This thread is about playstation, not about children.
